statements: SELECT * FROM occupancy_data WHERE room_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT room_id, occupancy_status FROM occupancy_data WHERE occupancy_status = 'occupied';
SELECT room_id, COUNT(*) AS total_occupancy FROM occupancy_data GROUP BY room_id;
SELECT * FROM occupancy_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT DISTINCT room_id FROM occupancy_data ORDER BY room_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM occupancy_data WHERE room_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT room_id, occupancy_status FROM occupancy_data WHERE occupancy_status = 'Occupied';
SELECT room_id, COUNT(*) AS total_occupancy FROM occupancy_data GROUP BY room_id HAVING total_occupancy > 10 ORDER BY room_id ASC;

SELECT room_id, SUM(CASE WHEN occupancy_status = 'Occupied' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_occupied, SUM(CASE WHEN occupancy_status = 'Vacant' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_vacant FROM occupancy_data GROUP BY room_id;
SELECT room_id, DATE(timestamp) AS date, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM occupancy_data GROUP BY room_id, date ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM occupancy_data WHERE room_id = 1
SELECT id, room_id FROM occupancy_data ORDER BY room_id DESC
SELECT * FROM schedule_data WHERE room_id = 2 AND heating_schedule IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, occupancy_timestamp FROM occupancy_data WHERE occupancy_status = TRUE
SELECT cooling_schedule FROM schedule_data WHERE room_id = 3
SELECT id, room_id, occupancy_status, occupancy_timestamp FROM occupancy_data WHERE occupancy_status = TRUE ORDER BY occupancy_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT room_id, COUNT(*) AS occupancy_count FROM occupancy_data GROUP BY room_id HAVING occupancy_count > 5 ORDER BY occupancy_count DESC
SELECT room_id, heating_schedule->>'temperature' AS heating_temperature, cooling_schedule->>'temperature' AS cooling_temperature FROM schedule_data WHERE room_id = 3
SELECT * FROM occupancy_data INNER JOIN schedule_data ON occupancy_data.room_id = schedule_data.room_id WHERE occupancy_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND heating_schedule->>'mode' = 'on'
SELECT room_id, MAX(occupancy_timestamp) AS latest_occupancy FROM occupancy_data GROUP BY room_id ORDER BY latest_occupancy DESC
SELECT * FROM Occupancy_Data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT room_number, occupancy_status FROM Occupancy_Data WHERE occupancy_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, room_number, occupancy_status FROM Occupancy_Data WHERE occupancy_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Cooling_Schedule ORDER BY room_number ASC;
SELECT id, heating_start_time, heating_end_time FROM Heating_Schedule WHERE heating_start_time <= NOW();
SELECT * FROM Occupancy_Data WHERE occupancy_status = true ORDER BY occupancy_timestamp DESC;
SELECT room_number, occupancy_status FROM Occupancy_Data WHERE room_number = 101 AND occupancy_status = true;
SELECT id, room_number, heating_start_time, heating_end_time FROM Heating_Schedule WHERE room_number = 201 ORDER BY heating_start_time ASC;
SELECT room_number, cooling_start_time, cooling_end_time FROM Cooling_Schedule WHERE cooling_start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND cooling_end_time <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, room_number, occupancy_status, occupancy_timestamp FROM Occupancy_Data WHERE occupancy_status = false ORDER BY room_number DESC, occupancy_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_occupancy;
SELECT id, room_name, occupancy_timestamp FROM heating_schedule WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT room_name, occupancy_status FROM cooling_schedule WHERE room_name = 'Living Room';
SELECT id, room_name, occupancy_status FROM occupancy_logs ORDER BY occupancy_timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM heating_schedule WHERE room_name = 'Bedroom';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_occupancy WHERE occupancy_status = 1 ORDER BY occupancy_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT room_name, temperature FROM heating_schedule WHERE temperature >= 70 ORDER BY room_name ASC;
SELECT room_name, temperature, start_time FROM cooling_schedule WHERE temperature < 60 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT room_name, COUNT(*) AS total_occupancy FROM occupancy_logs GROUP BY room_name HAVING total_occupancy > 5;
SELECT room_name, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM cooling_schedule GROUP BY room_name ORDER BY max_temp DESC;
SELECT * FROM OccupancyData;
SELECT room_id, COUNT(*) FROM OccupancyData GROUP BY room_id;
SELECT * FROM RoomDetails WHERE room_area > 50;
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM TemperatureData WHERE room_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT room_id, heating_start_time, heating_end_time FROM HeatingSchedule WHERE room_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM OccupancyData LIMIT 10;
SELECT room_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature FROM TemperatureData GROUP BY room_id;
SELECT rd.room_name, td.temperature FROM RoomDetails rd JOIN TemperatureData td ON rd.room_id = td.room_id;
SELECT timestamp, room_id, occupancy_status FROM OccupancyData WHERE room_id = 2 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT hs.room_id, hs.heating_start_time, hs.heating_end_time, cs.cooling_start_time, cs.cooling_end_time FROM HeatingSchedule hs JOIN CoolingSchedule cs ON hs.room_id = cs.room_id;
